Description: {{PageRef|Other|alt_name=General}}

* {{PageRef|{{PageRef|Souls|alt_name=Soul}} Orb}}s no longer have special duplication rules before 8 minutes. {{PageRef|Souls|alt_name=Soul}} splitting rules are now the same before 8 minutes as afterwards. Adjusted trooper economy to compensate. There is also no longer a bounty bump that occurs at 8 minutes.
* Wave interval increased from 25s to 30s (bounty values adjusted by the same ratio)
* {{PageRef|Guardian}}s attack range reduced from 38.1m to 35m
* {{PageRef|Guardian}}s {{PageRef|Melee|alt_name=melee}} attempt range reduced from 6.1m to 5m
* {{PageRef|Guardian}}s {{PageRef|Melee|alt_name=melee}} damage range reduced from 8m to 7m
* Players can no longer {{PageRef|Parry}} troopers
* Medic {{PageRef|Trooper}}: Heal no longer has charges (was 3)
* Medic {{PageRef|Trooper}}: Cooldown reduced from 35s to 6s (this was the previous setup before)
* Medic {{PageRef|Trooper}}: Fixed healing sometimes not functioning on bounce when there are walls nearby
* {{PageRef|Trooper}}s will no longer aggro to you when you shoot them while they are attacking a {{PageRef|Guardian}}
* {{PageRef|Soul Urn|alt_name=Urn}} now reveals you immediately
* First {{PageRef|Soul Urn|alt_name=urn}} is now considered for comeback mechanics (15% NW delta)
* {{PageRef|Soul Urn|alt_name=Urn}} now has a visual indication on the model to indicate if its a side favored pickup
* {{PageRef|Soul Urn|alt_name=Urn}} will no longer wait indefinitely for someone nearby to pick him up. He'll ignore loiterers after 20 seconds in aggregate and start running back home
* Fixed Debuff Resistance affecting {{PageRef|Soul Urn|alt_name=Urn}} pickup time
* Heavy {{PageRef|Melee}} Cancel momentum is significantly reduced
Trooper AI Fixes
* {{PageRef|Melee}} troopers will no longer see and follow players around corners and through {{PageRef|Cosmic Veil|alt_name=veil}}s
* Smoothed out trooper navigation in some spots of the map where they need to drop down
* {{PageRef|Trooper}}s that are attacking shrines are no longer distracted from their task by distant enemy troopers
* {{PageRef|Trooper}}s now know to cross the base and attack the other shrine once their near one is defeated
* Fixed a bug where troopers would rapidly change targets when multiple enemies are in range
* Fixed a bug where troopers would fidget with their facing direction when walking without a target
* Fixed a bug where troopers would fear really steep stairs
* Fixed a bug where troopers would flash their targeting flare at the targeted player every time they came into camera or line of sight
Items
* {{PageRef|Hollow Point Ward}}: Spirit Shield reduced from 95 to 70
* {{PageRef|Hollow Point Ward}}: Weapon Damage reduced from 20% to 18%
* {{PageRef|Healing Rite}}: Total HP Regen reduced from 370 to 350
* {{PageRef|Healing Rite}}: Cooldown increased from 64s to 70s
* {{PageRef|Healbane}}: Heal on kill changed from 350 to 275
* {{PageRef|Enchanter's Barrier}}: Reduced from 300 to 250
* {{PageRef|Combat Barrier}}: Reduced from 325 to 275
* {{PageRef|Divine Barrier}}: Cooldown increased from 30s to 40s
* {{PageRef|Restorative Locket}}: Range to gain charges reduced from 50m to 35m
* {{PageRef|Restorative Locket}}: Heal per stack reduced from 32 to 30
* {{PageRef|Debuff Reducer}}: Health reduced from 125 to 75
* {{PageRef|Debuff Reducer}}: Debuff Reduction reduced from 28 to 24%
* {{PageRef|Fortitude}}: Weapon Damage reduced from 27% to 23%
* {{PageRef|Fortitude}}: Out of combat time increased from 10s to 13s
* {{PageRef|Phantom Strike}}: Cooldown increased from 26s to 30s
* {{PageRef|Spirit Strike}}: Spirit Resist Reduction reduced from 12% to 8%
* {{PageRef|Decay}}: Health Regen reduced from 1.5 to 1
* {{PageRef|Decay}}: Spirit Power reduced from +7 to +4
* {{PageRef|Decay}}: Cooldown increased from 33s to 36s
* {{PageRef|Knockdown}}: Now removes all momentum and brings heroes straight down
* {{PageRef|Ethereal Shift}}: Moved from Tier 3 to Tier 4
* {{PageRef|Ethereal Shift}}: Can now be canceled early
* {{PageRef|Ethereal Shift}}: Duration increased from 3.5s to 4s
* {{PageRef|Ethereal Shift}}: Max speed during activation increased from 2m/s to 3m/s
* {{PageRef|Echo Shard}}: Cooldown increased from 21s to 23s
Heroes
* {{PageRef|Bebop}}: Base stamina reduced from 3 to 2
* {{PageRef|Bebop}}: Base regen reduced from 3 to 1.5
* {{PageRef|Bebop}}: No longer gains +1% Spirit Resist Per Boon
* {{PageRef|Calico}}: Base ammo reduced from 12 to 9
* {{PageRef|Calico}}: {{PageRef|Weapon|alt_name=Gun}} damage growth reduced by 25%
* {{PageRef|Calico}}: {{PageRef|Gloom Bombs}} T1 and T2 swapped
* {{PageRef|Grey Talon}}: HP regen reduced from 2.5 to 1.5
* {{PageRef|Grey Talon}}: Move Speed spirit scaling reduced from 0.025 to 0.014
* {{PageRef|Grey Talon}}: {{PageRef|Charged Shot}} damage reduced from 100 to 90
* {{PageRef|Grey Talon}}: {{PageRef|Charged Shot}} spirit scaling reduced from 1.6 to 1.2
* {{PageRef|Grey Talon}}: {{PageRef|Charged Shot}} T3 spirit scaling increased from +0.9 to +1.3
* {{PageRef|Haze}}: {{PageRef|Sleep Dagger}} now causes the target to be unable to slide while drowsy
* {{PageRef|Haze}}: {{PageRef|Sleep Dagger}} T2 now also reduces Stamina Regeneration by 60% for 6s
* {{PageRef|Haze}}: {{PageRef|Bullet Dance}} Fire Rate increased from +30% to +35%
* {{PageRef|Haze}}: {{PageRef|Bullet Dance}} T2 increased from -40s Cooldown to -50s
* {{PageRef|Holliday}}: Base {{PageRef|Weapon|alt_name=gun}} damage reduced from 29 to 26
* {{PageRef|Holliday}}: {{PageRef|Weapon|alt_name=Gun}} damage growth increased from 1.53 to 1.72
* {{PageRef|Holliday}}: Lasso bonus {{PageRef|Bounce Pad|alt_name=bounce pad}} duration reduced from 1.5 to 1s
* {{PageRef|Holliday}}: Fixed being able to Heavy {{PageRef|Melee}} while casting Lasso
* {{PageRef|Ivy}}: Headshot hitbox is smaller now (no longer includes the ears)
* {{PageRef|Ivy}}: Fixed visibility issues with {{PageRef|Air Drop}}
* {{PageRef|Kelvin}}: Base Spirit Resist reduced from 15% to 0
* {{PageRef|Kelvin}}: Now gains +1% Spirit Resist per boon
* {{PageRef|Kelvin}}: Base Sprint reduced from 2 to 1.5
* {{PageRef|Kelvin}}: {{PageRef|Frozen Shelter}} cooldown increased from 130s to 140s
* {{PageRef|Kelvin}}: {{PageRef|Frozen Shelter}} T2 Cooldown increased from -40s to -50s
* {{PageRef|Lady Geist}}: Fixed some cases where Life Swap did not work
* {{PageRef|Lash}}: {{PageRef|Ground Strike}} base damage reduced from 90 to 75
* {{PageRef|Lash}}: {{PageRef|Death Slam}} lock-on time increased from 0.6s to 0.7s
* {{PageRef|McGinnis}}: {{PageRef|Mini Turret}}s tracking speed increased by 15%
* {{PageRef|McGinnis}}: {{PageRef|Mini Turret}}s bullet velocity increased by 10%
* {{PageRef|McGinnis}}: {{PageRef|Mini Turret}}s T3 now also increases duration by 18s
* {{PageRef|Mirage}}: Base Health reduced from 550 to 500
* {{PageRef|Mirage}}: {{PageRef|Djinn's Mark}} T1 slow reduced from 80% to 60%
* {{PageRef|Mirage}}: {{PageRef|Fire Scarabs}} Bullet Resist Reduction reduced from -10% to -8%
* {{PageRef|Mo & Krill}}: {{PageRef|Burrow}} T2 reduced from +140 Damage to +100
* {{PageRef|Mo & Krill}}: {{PageRef|Burrow}} spirit scaling increased from 1.4 to 1.7
* {{PageRef|Mo & Krill}}: {{PageRef|Combo}} DPS reduced from 60 to 40
* {{PageRef|Mo & Krill}}: {{PageRef|Combo}} spirit scaling increased from 1.1 to 1.3
* {{PageRef|Paradox}}: {{PageRef|Kinetic Carbine}} T2 reduced from -10s Cooldown to -8s
* {{PageRef|Pocket}}: Base bullet damage reduced from 4.5 to 3.9
* {{PageRef|Pocket}}: Bullet damage growth increased from 0.28 to 0.32
* {{PageRef|Pocket}}: {{PageRef|Enchanter's Satchel}} damage reduced from 100 to 70
* {{PageRef|Pocket}}: {{PageRef|Enchanter's Satchel}} T2 damage increased from +80 to +110
* {{PageRef|Seven}}: {{PageRef|Storm Cloud}} lightning bolt damage reduced from 150 to 100
* {{PageRef|Seven}}: {{PageRef|Storm Cloud}} lightning bolt radius increased from 6m to 7m
* {{PageRef|Sinclair}}: Bullet damage reduced from 23 to 20
* {{PageRef|Sinclair}}: Fixed {{PageRef|Rabbit Hex}} Damage Amp not affecting allied damage
* {{PageRef|Sinclair}}: {{PageRef|Rabbit Hex}} Damage Amp reduced from 25% to 15%
* {{PageRef|Sinclair}}: {{PageRef|Rabbit Hex}} Damage Amp spirit scaling reduced from 0.1 to 0.06
* {{PageRef|Sinclair}}: {{PageRef|Rabbit Hex}} T3 now also increases Damage Amp by +5%
* {{PageRef|Sinclair}}: {{PageRef|Rabbit Hex}} Move Speed increased from 15% to 22%
* {{PageRef|Sinclair}}: {{PageRef|Rabbit Hex}} no longer deals 80 damage
* {{PageRef|Sinclair}}: {{PageRef|Vexing Bolt}} min damage reduced from 75 to 65
* {{PageRef|Sinclair}}: {{PageRef|Vexing Bolt}} max damage reduced from 150 to 130
* {{PageRef|Vindicta}}: {{PageRef|Crow Familiar}} Cooldown increased from 26s to 28s
* {{PageRef|Vindicta}}: {{PageRef|Crow Familiar}} T3 Spirit and Bullet Resist Reduction reduced from -12% to -8%
* {{PageRef|Warden}}: Base health increased from 550 to 575
* {{PageRef|Warden}}: Base regen increased from 2 to 3
* {{PageRef|Warden}}: Fixed {{PageRef|Phantom Strike}} and {{PageRef|Warp Stone}} working through Binding Ward capture
